effectDescription:
NSLOCTEXT("[1909495A4C2095068D406C9D33F90055]", "561D025A42E3D08A36A1EB861363CAD9", "Your next weapon combo finisher triggers an additional effect based on your active melody. This effect will consume up to 3 resonance stacks to increase in power.

<Bold>Menacing</>
Deal bonus $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Menacing$ and apply $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Menacing.apply0$ to each target hit.

<Bold>Cathartic</>
Deal bonus $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Cathartic$ and apply $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Cathartic.apply0$ to each target hit.

<Bold>Cheerful</>
Heal a nearby injured ally for $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Cheerful_Projectile$. Favors yourself and party members. Applies $effect:Bard_Glee$ at 3 or more resonance stacks.

<Bold>Pensive</>
Restore mana to a nearby ally in need equal to $statmod:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Pensive_AoE.Faddnostat$ + $statmod:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Pensive_AoE.F%magicalmax$. Favors yourself and party members.

<Bold>Epic</>
Dispel up to 3 crowd control effects from up to $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Epic_AoE.mtph$ nearby allies and apply $hit:Bard_ResonantWeapon_End_Epic_Projectile.apply0$.")
name: Bard_Resonance
